Uses of Package
de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.extraction

    Package Description
    de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.extraction  
    de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.tests.data  
  • Classes in de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.extraction used by de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.extraction 
    Class and Description
    CustomPattern
    Class to store the pattern and the match count, which represent how appropriate the pattern to the reference part.
    The match position and the match lenght is necessary to sort the matches of different CustomPattern instances
  • Classes in de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.extraction used by de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.tests.data 
    Class and Description
    BodyExtraction
    Class used to extract text phrases from a text corpus.
    HeadExtraction
    Class for extracting the head information of a science paper.
    ReferenceExtraction
    This class find the references with the authors, title and year in a reference Part string of scientific Paper.
